description: Play this VR game with friends and others. Protect your stack and destroy the blocks of your opponents. Win the game by having the biggest stack at the end of the round. Search for games or host your own. Full Crossplay support! Play on PCVR against Quest 1/2 Players.

name: Chevalier Historie
description: The fate of a captured princess lies in the hands of a single woman. Using the power of the spirits and a variety of items, the female knight Jeanne must explore the kingdom that's been thrown into chaos to save Princess Lily in this classic-style action RPG.

name: Heisen Bay
description: A beautiful, 3rd-person exploration and adventure game. Tommy, the main character in the game, is trying to find out what happened to his comrades in Heisen Bay, an area that leads to multiple mysterious events.

name: Rocket Ghost Aidan 2
description: Rocket Ghost Aidan is on a new adventure through Com's dense dimension. Compact with enemies, treasures to hunt down, and challenges to overcome.

name: Last Kingdom: The Card Game
description: Last Kingdom is a hardcore strategy battles card game. Demon King was conquered your country, and now is sending the army to conquer the last kingdom. Bring your country survivor to help the last kingdom facing the army, discover all possible strategy, and defend the last kingdom in this land!

name: Desert Pirates
description: Lead a post-apocalyptic war convoy through the wasteland filled with ruthless foes, destroy them and take whatever you can to keep going. Fight, get resources and survive. How far can you ride?

name: Toy Chase
description: Move, run, jump, pick up stuff, avoid enemies and traps, use gadgets and enjoy playing this friendly 2D game.

name: Recon Control
description: Recon Control is a turn-based strategy and 2D platformer hybrid focused on combat. You play as a commander of the small special operations unit. Choose the right fighters for specific tasks, train them, buy equipment, and lead your unit through a set of missions to the final.

name: Entodrive
description: Monster RPG about collecting magical computer bugs while exploring Cache Isle!

name: Low Story
description: Low gets thrown from the top floor of a building, and he falls into the dark world. After his fall, Low wants to return but he finds the door locked by Red One The World Keeper. Thus, Low starts looking for the key hoping revenge.

name: Hero of the Demon
description: The protagonist is a new adventurer, but he has the ability to destroy Warcraft alone. One day, because of the invitation of a mysterious voice, he embarked on the journey of crusading against the Demon King. On the journey, he meets demonic girls of different races one after another.

name: Hoesa Kiugi
description:
This is a company management simulation game that anyone can easily play.

In this game, you can decide the name of the company and raise the company.
Also, you can hire a company employee.

Raise your company and make it the best company. Good luck!

name: Suteki na Kanojo no Tsukurikata
description: This is a story between a yandere social anxious girl and a wellborn young lady, produced by the Japanese Bishoujo game brand Sushi soft. Interaction occurs at several points where choices are given to the player, and these choices eventually lead to 8 various endings.

name: Video Game Fables
description:
"Video Game Fables" is a fun, lighthearted RPG adventure set in a once-traditional RPG world that hasn't had a player in decades.

The world's script gets completely ruined by someone calling herself "The Forsaken Princess." It's up to Aru (the world's princess), Nate (an NPC aspiring to be a hero), and Tator (the villain's son) to get things back to normal...or maybe change everything forever.

name: Rachael Savage
description: Play as a fearsome bounty hunter in this adventure game about hunting down an unbeatable threat! Turn invisible to sneak past enemies, slash with your sword, and use other unique items you find along the way to help acquire new bounties across the land.

developers.name: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: ForkJump
description: A platformer exploration game. Play with the strange innovative gameplay mechanisms. Set in a mysterious fantasy world of caves, nature and built structures. Collect the keys to proceed and find the legendary treasure.

description: A simulator of a space suit with a jetpack in worlds with real physics, zero gravity and gravitational anomalies. Your main enemy is Newton's first law.

description: Milkyway Funland is a collection of stunning, exciting, and fun VR games and experiences. The game takes you to the galaxy‚Äôs best amusement park in the 31st century. In this space station, everyone can try and experience incredible and impossible things from the past, present, and future.

name: Battle Royale Craft
description: Do you like shooting games? Enjoy playing Battle Royale Craft with cool pixel art and fast action gameplay!

name: OceanCraft
description: OceanCraft is a game about surviving alone - or with your friends on a self build vehicle in the ocean.

name: A-Star Theft
description: A-Star Theft allows the player to execute heists with a wide variety of methods. Sneak or shoot your way to the loot using specialized equipment tailored to each strategy. Play as Logan Huntborn, and fight to keep your crew safe and free after getting offered a deal.

name: Polygon World VR
description: Polygon world VR will give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in an unusual low-poly style. With the visual composition and musical accompaniment, your consciousness will be completely relaxed by five minutes.

name: VR Titanic: Find the Rose
description: This is a Virtual Reality Inventory-type game that allows you to explore the great ship RMS Titanic, Find your Love and save her!

name: Lost Astronaut
description: Control a spaceship and attempts to land safely on blue platforms. You can move the ship and burn fuel to fire a thruster, attempting to gently land on marked areas. A new scenario is loaded after every successful landing.

name: Vermillion
description: Vermillion is a VR painting simulator, bringing the full analogue joy of oil painting into the digital world. Get the unrivaled sense of accomplishment from creating something beautiful on the canvas, without the messy living room.

name: A Conversation With Mister Rabbit
description: A Conversation With Mister Rabbit is a very short, linear visual novel with a dark and bloody twist. The story follows an aspiring knight who seeks wisdom from a big and fluffy rabbit.

name: Trap Legend
description: In the beginning, Crossdressers were the sun... And Goddesses too! A story of turmoil filled romance between man and crossdresser in modern times, brought back to the forefront by the Goddesses of legend! A hymn of love for the new generation of crossdressers!

name: Scraplers
description: A 2D procedurally generated top-down view sandbox set in a post-apocalyptic world in which you have to survive as the captain of a desert combat vehicle.

name: LemWars
description: The Emperor has appointed you as commander-in-chief of the army, do not let him down! Under your command there are thousands of volunteers ready to fight without sparing their lives. Build a well-adjusted war machine where every soldier knows his place.

name: Blue Energy
description: A mysterious entity guides you to build a factory in a post-apocalyptic desert...

name: Xenotype

Take control of humanity's biggest scientific achievement as you fight back against a deadly alien invasion. Explore an expansive action/adventure campaign alone, OR recruit a friend and dominate together!

name: Forgotten Trace: Thanatos in Nostalgia
description: Forgotten Trace: Thanatos in Nostalgia is an enchanting all-ages dramatic mystery visual novel by developer Almaz.

Let the dice forge the fate of your hero and the realm by fighting the Grave knight and his horde.

description: Crossword puzzles with trivia from a popular fantasy tv series.

How good are you and are you ready to show the world your impressive BJ skills?

name: Under the Ghost Mountain

Under the ghost mountain is hell,so there are many ghost arround the mountain. Player will run away from mountain top, and will face many ghost. It's a story about a hero's growing up.

name: Little Party Legends
description: Matchmake with other randoms or invite your friends to compete in alot of different minigames. Unlock alot of cool stuff with in game currency.

name: Stay Safe 2020

name: The Summoner

name: Ultimate Battle
description: A game full of action and lots and lots of fun. Play numerous maps against your friends. Many modes: 1v1, 1v2, all against all.

name: The Fable of a Rabbit

name: Dreamhouse: The Game
description: Create, destroy, construct. Building a house is an extremely difficult process, requiring expert knowledge. In Dreamhouse: The Game you are able to learn all the secrets and steps necessary to create the perfect home.

name: Arcane Eyes
description: Arcane Eyes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Green Fairy VR
description: Follow the Green Fairy‚Äôs adventure as she learns to appreciate her unique green glow by finding refuge at the traffic lights in the Big Little City.

You can learn about the girls' stories through various clues. The secret hidden in the girl is waiting for you to discover.

description: Simulation of Life in Hell

The protagonist of the game is a merchant engaged in interplanetary trade, but as the story unfolds, the player can choose the path of an interstellar pirate or a planetary explorer.

description: This game will let you experience the thrills of a shark kingdom. You need to explore under the sea, fight with sharks, repel all kinds of sharks that attack you, and finally get the treasure of the shark kingdom. This game is fun for teenagers who love sharks.

Expand your progression with questing & minigames. Rewards are in the form of coins, gems & XP.

Moloko ‚Äî is a traditional jigsaw puzzle that anyone can easily play.

A lot of convenient functions for completing the puzzle

Moloko ‚Äî is a definitive version that you can enjoy a jigsaw puzzle of Windows, Linux and Android platform.

name: Sheep Love
description: Little game of living with cute sheep "MeiMei"

name: VR Atlantis Search: with Deep Diving
description: In the game, players will move through each level to find the stone gate and finally obtain the treasure map. The humanoid guards will patrol outside the treasure map for a long time, pay attention to avoiding and obtain the treasure.

name: SpermDash
description: Learn how to pass on love in Sex-Ed Runner Game Sperm Dash.

name: Loofy

description: Dungeon Scale is a couch multiplayer dungeon scaling game for 2-4 players that‚Äôs inspired by the coin collecting classics of our age. Dungeon Scale‚Äôs core mechanics are simple yet fun, reach the top of the dungeon before your opponents, whilst collecting as many goodies as you can.

name: Tale of an Apocalypse
description: Tale of an Apocalypse is a Hardcore Survival Game set in a Post-Apocalyptic World, you have to Survive in a Dark World , fight against Mutants and Humans, one of your Main Goals is to Build a Safe Colony for Future Colonists.

name: Mission Z
description: Live an intense story by recovering a mysterious area. With survival elements, loots and collectibles.

name: Draginsanity
description: Welcome to the magical realm Draginsanity. It is full of dragons! And it is totally insane! Enjoy some old school 2D platformer action.

name: Holy Stick!
description: Holy Stick! is a 2D multiplayer fighting game, which lets you cut your friends‚Äô legs with a machete or blow their brains out using powerful guns. Experience unique playthroughs every time you play, thanks to multiple gamemodes and crazy modifiers!

name: Gladia

name: Puzzletronics Digital Infinite

The village has fallen on hard times after climate change and overfishing have shut down the cannery. Meet residents, grow relationships, build your boat, fish, and live a cozy coastal life

name: Martian Potato
description: Galactic farmer - it sounds proud! Do you have a farm on the Red Planet?

name: Drunken Samurai
description: Drunken Samurai is a 2D platformer where as a samurai you have to get some booze to keep the fun going. The drink-lover will stop at nothing! Kill opponents level by level and get your sake.

name: Jing 'an District Copstories
description: Jing' an District is a peaceful place, but sometimes some interesting cases will happen. The cases here are not all so bloody. But it also brings us a lot of reflection and insight. You will play a young policeman in Jing 'an District. Go through and solve these cases with your partner.

name: My Neighbor Alice
description: My Neighbor Alice is a multiplayer builder-game where players build and create their own virtual lands, interact with neighbors, perform exciting daily activities and earn rewards.

name: Amazing Joes Journey
description: Amazing Joe's Journey is a simple point & click browser game. A main character is Joe who landed in forest on his flying carpet and wants to find a treasure. It's placed at an island and Joe needs a boat.

name: Simple Fear
description: You have a simple target to take revenge on. Well things turns out not to be that simple...

name: Right Way
description: Right Way is a game that is based on the simple and old Pipeline puzzle, and takes design inspiration from the game Delete.

name: Spooky Speedrun
description: Spooky Speedrun is a highly challenging 3D-Platformer, where the player has to perform one difficult jump after another in time-based levels, that require perfect timing and execution. The game has no easy-mode or upgrade abilities, you‚Äôll have to rely on pure skill. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Conflict of the Universe
description: This game is fully built around Steam play together. You and 3 other friends can control a star ship together and fight back enemies that you counter! Different star ships to control, each having their different movement and weapons, and some will have abilities.

name: TerraMartis4x
description: For gamers who love Master of Orion and Homeworld but want something new and different. For gamers with a small time budget. A lightweight fresh take on the space 4x game genre about the war between Terra and Mars.

name: WestLand Adventure
description: WestLand Adventure - a dynamic 2D platformer. You go through the levels dealing with monsters, collect gold and at the end of the completed level you can spend you cash on improvements (double jumps or unique weapons).

name: Kids of Karendow
description: Kids of Karendow's story contains serious themes, with funny characters, and is truly epic in nature. It features a fast paced, action packed, combat system that is reminiscent of a combination of Lunar and Grandia series. It will also contain a slew of mini games and side quests.

name: Child Arms
description: A 2D arcade sword-fighter, Child Arms takes you to an alternate 16th century where the youth take center stage. Select one of 8 fighters from a variety of cultures and ethnicities and test your skills against challengers as they explore their world for the first time.

name: Pixel Poops
description: You have a problem with joggers. They think they own the whole park. They talk about motivation, or reaching their goals. But in this action-packed throwback to early 80s console games, you'll show them. You'll stop them yourself...in the most effective way you know.

name: Rotten Tide
description: Rotten Tide is a horizontal 2D tower defense game where players must protect the world from the attacks of all kinds of monsters who are threatening the humans in big cities all around the world.

name: Gravity Shifter
description: A cool 3D sifi space adventure that will let you travel in zero gravity.

name: Unlord
description: Lords of the Damned Land - a text quest, a book-playing in the genre of gloomy fantasy, mixed with jokes on the verge of madness. 80,000 words, 1000 pages, 3 win endings and lots of other endings.

name: Haitoku Silene
description: This game is not for the pure hearted. You'll fall into the deep pits of hell once you touch upon her secret...

name: Airplane shooting spree
description: A black-and-white imitation of the nostalgic game, using the mouse to slide, avoid, attack, and constantly improve their firepower, in the dense enemy adhere to the last bar!

name: Neocense
description: You explore the world of Cha as Amori, who has the ability to switch to the Realm of Living and the Realm of Passing. Switch between the realms to complete puzzles, perform spirit rituals and fight The Hunters in unique puzzle combat.

name: Dragon Saddle Melee
description: Fight waves of enemy dragons and other players in chaotic, multiplayer, classic arcade action

name: Test Tube Titans: Taster Trial
description: Take on your friends in a chaotic physics-based wrestling match using giant monsters that have been procedurally mutated to be unique every time you play. Or, craft a custom titan and take it for a walk through the neighbourhood, tearing up everything as you go!

name: Galaxy in Peril: Time Trouble
description: The galaxy is in peril again. Falias forces have made it back to your galaxy, and want to harvest the energy from your star! The only way to stop them is to go back in time using a newly discovered blackhole. Go back in time, disable the devices, and save your galaxy!

name: Lost In Fantaland
description: Lost In Fantaland is a retro pixel-style roguelite game that blends deck building and turn-based strategies on a checkerboard.

name: Mutant Alley: Do the Dinosaur
description: Mutant Alley is a gay first-person sex simulation. You are going to interact with one of their most talented soldier's: The anthropomorphic T-Rex.

name: Magical Stock Princess
description: Magical Stock Princess is a quick to play blend of arcade levels and lite rpg elements. Avoid monsters while you clear the floor in the Acton stages, and interact with quirky characters in the Adventure stages. Enjoy the best of two worlds without the drawbacks. 100% bat caves-free.

name: Gun Bots
description: Customize your Gun Bots to fight through 7 unique worlds with different weather conditions that become more challenging as you progress.

name: Battle Alchemy
description: You apprentice and heir of the great magician-alchemist, but, unfortunately, after his death, all the burden of worries and protection of the castle with the surrounding lands fell on your shoulders. As it turned out, the neighboring lords, having learned about the death of your mentor, decided that now the surrounding lands were left...

name: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story
description: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story is a warm, lighthearted erotic visual novel exploring what it means to rebuild and reinvent yourself against a backdrop of late-stage capitalism.

name: RussianPunk 2007
description: The worker from the factory thought like everyone else that 2007 will not be returned!Until he accidentally stumbled upon magic mushrooms on his way home.

name: Knight Throde
description: A platform jumping and action RPG. Play various heroes and explore the kingdom! Make friends and defeat the rebelions!

name: OMG: One More Goal!
description: OMG - One More Goal! is an arcade / fighting game with soccer dynamics. Team play is essential: you win together, you lose together!

name: Mind Rite

name: Input6
description: INPUT6 is a short, fast-paced horror game. Search through the abandoned robot factory avoiding eye contact with malfunctioning robot by instantly switching between playing in separate sections of the factory. Figure out what led to the company's collapse. Be quick! You don‚Äôt have much time.

name: Twin Stick Tanks
description: Twin Stick Tanks is an action packed tank shooting party game where you battle to blow eachothers tops off in an explosive plume of smoke!

name: Hunt the Lights
description: Hunt the Lights is a arcade clicker game, a hunt for highscore. Play tactical to break your own highscore. It is fast, it is hard.

name: Bankrupt Heroines
description: The world is doomed and monsters are taken over. The heroine has to save the world and save loved ones even in bankruptcy. Countless difficulties await, but the true heroine will not give up.

A huge number of various puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent!

description: One More Dungeon 2 is a first-person shooter roguelike with procedurally generated levels and a variety of enemies.

description: Play as your favorite Waifu and try and defeat the never ending waves of Simps coming your way, how long can you last?

description: ShapeNeon Chaos is an old school style space-shooter. You are a ship facing off waves of deadly enemies. This game was made to give you a shot of adrenaline in a couple of minutes. Lots of bullets and neon in an arcade psychedelic shooter!

In this tactical turn based game you have to take on the role of the commander of the Volot detachment - the instruments of communism - in order to find this home, and, if necessary, take it by force...

name: Rectifying Zion
description: 450BC Israel. The exiles are returning. Reconstruct the city of Jerusalem as you face moral challenges and make choices that will ultimately direct the outcome. Roam around the city of Jerusalem, including the temple, farms, villages and cities in this historical open world 3rd person RPG.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season I - Seize the Crown
description:
In this land, soldiers rise from nothing to be crowned kings. Those who live long enough may see empires rise from the ashes of an old world, only to burn all the same. The cycle repeats, like the coming of the dawn, the falling veil of night, or the changing of the seasons. War begets war.
As clashing swords ring and castle walls are torn asunder, the symphony of war calls out to distant lands and invites new challengers to fight for control of this land. A new dawn is rising, and with it, challengers to seize everything its light shines upon. Who will reign supreme, and who will fade away in the pages of history?

name: Kayak VR: Mirage
description: Kayak VR: Mirage is a jaw-dropping and exhilarating journey through beautiful and unique locations, tailor-made for Virtual Reality. Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free-ride mode for a leisurely trip and take in the sights of our varied locales, ranging from realistic to surreal.

name: Lostria
description: Lostria is a competitive tactical game in a fantasy world. Compete against other players across the world in turn-based matches and collect characters to build you best team and climb the ladder.

name: Bitcoin Hodler
description:
An unabashed celebration of the memes, history, and humor of cryptocurrency, Bitcoin Hodler delights both blockchain evangelists and casual gamers looking for a challenging yet entertaining mobile gameplay experience constantly reshaped by real-world data.

Navigate the charts and accumulate crypto in challenging side-scrolling gameplay, then fly to the moon in a top-down racing style game once you've HODLed long enough to enter FOMO mode.
